title: Variable
description: A measurable oceanographic property, such as temperature, salinity, or current, corresponding to SOSA ObservableProperty.

@context.description: The JSON-LD context defining term mappings.

@type.description: The JSON-LD type of the resource.

@id.description: The globally unique URI identifier for this resource.

name.description: Human-readable name of the variable (e.g., Temperature, Salinity).

description.description: A textual description of what this variable represents or how it's measured.
